text: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie () is a 1972 French Italian Spanish comedy drama movie directed by Luis Buñuel and starring Fernando Rey, Paul Frankeur, Delphine Seyrig, Stéphane Audran, Bulle Ogier, Jean-Pierre Cassel. The movie was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a box office hit in both Europe and the US, and critically praised. It won the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film and was nominated for Best Original Screenplay in 1973. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1972 comedy-drama movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Luis Buñuel Category:Movies about dreams Category:Movies about drugs Category:French-language movies
title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
